name: 3D Cars Simulator Project
description:
(23/12/16) Update : Migrated to - http://gamejolt.com/games/cars-3d-project/219082

Use - W,A,S,D to move car/player. Reload the page to try a different mode.

A work in progress game made with unity as part of a school project.

Contains a Freeroam mode in which the player can use a First Person Camera Controller to look at the environment.

The normal mode lets the player drive a car with 3 more cars using a simple AI. As of now the checkpoint and lap system hasn't been added. I aspire to complete this project and polish it as soon as I get time.

Music Credits - Force by Alan Walker (Car mode)

Spectre by Alan walker (Freeroam)

Project Made by : Archit Checker.
